full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Notice Directorate, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

### Reference Information

- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005493
- **Solicitation Number**: 01R11-23-C040
- **Publication Date**: August 26, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 20, 2022, 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time
- **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Saskatchewan

### Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites suppliers to submit proposals for the supply of Agricultural Tractors, under a Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. The bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers who hold a pre-qualified status under this SA.

### Important Requirements

- The requested delivery date for the goods is March 31, 2023.
- Bidders must have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A to participate.

### Contact Information
For further information, kindly contact:
- **Name**: Camille Sobczak
- **Email**: [camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca](mailto:camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 204-430-5426

### Debriefings

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Please submit your request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that your bid was unsuccessful.

### Additional Information

Please refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-645-75635, for further information on becoming a pre-qualified supplier under this SA.

Note: All documents related to this tender announcement are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website. You will have 15 days to review the documents starting from the publication date. The documents will remain active on the website for 15 days past the closing date.  During this time, further inquiries may be directed to the contact information provided above. 

Once you are satisfied with your response, kindly send it back to the original contractor.  They will make necessary adjustments if there are any. 

* Good luck. *Good
